Title: Baaz
Writer: Surmeet Maavi (dialogue by), Dheeraj Rattan, Raj Verma (screen play and dialogue)
Actors: Mukul Dev, Surmeet Maavi, Babbu Mann, Yograj Singh
Plot: Good cop tries to uproot corruption from the Punjab (India) police, and challenge institutional collusion with evil businessmen who are secretly drug barons. A bit like Udta Punjab but far, far inferior.
